name: Project Garfield
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This is a fanmade game.

Garfield and all other characters are owned by Jim Davis, Paws Inc. and Nickelodeon 

This is not an official Garfield release. Please don't sue me.

______

A short horror inspired puzzle game based on everyone's favorite fat, lasagna loving, sexy beast.

You play as Jon Arbuckle trying to find his family after a mysterious power outage.

______
